level.heading: DELIVERY AND PERFORMANCE[COLON] GENERAL PROVISIONS (ยง 27-2300)

level.text: The time of delivery or performance is an essential contract element and shall be clearly stated in each solicitation.
A contracting officer shall ensure that a delivery or performance schedule is realistic and meets the requirements of the procurement.
Except when clearly unnecessary, a solicitation shall inform bidders or offerors of the basis on which their bids or proposals will be evaluated with respect to time of delivery or performance.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is the District of Columbia Procurement Practices Act of 1985, D.C. Law 6-85, as amended, D.C. Code ยง1-1181 et seq. (1981).
